title: Kimi ga Nozomu Eien (Rumbling Hearts)
synopsis: In the warmth of a golden sun, timid high school student Haruka Suzumiya confesses to Takayuki Narumi, the boy she admires. Takayuki accepts Haruka's confession and the two become a couple, supported by their mutual friends Mitsuki Hayase and Shinji Taira. All is well for these friendsâ€”until tragedy strikes.
